Business description: Gazprom

PJSC Gazprom Neft is one of the Russian largest oil and gas groups. Net sales break down by activity as follows:

- refining and distribution (97.5%): 43.5 Mt of crude oil refined, 47.4 Mt of petroleum products sold and 17.3 billion m3 of natural gas sold in 2021. At the end of 2021, the group operated a network of 1,897 filling stations located primarily in Russia (1,271);

- exploration and production of hydrocarbons (2.5%): crude oil, condensates and liquefied natural gas (62 Mt produced in 2021) and natural gas (47.8 billion m3 produced).

Net sales are distributed geographically as follows: Russia (50.3%), CIS (5.1%) and other (44.6%).
